permalink: /llms.txt
---
# {{ site.title }}

> {{ site.description }}

This site provides markdown versions of all content for AI/LLM crawlers and agents.

## Accessing Markdown Content

### Individual Posts
Append `.md` to any post URL to get the markdown version:
- HTML: `{{ site.url }}/2013/01/01/example-post/`
- Markdown: `{{ site.url }}/2013/01/01/example-post.md`

### All Posts Feed
A complete markdown feed of all posts is available at:
{{ site.url }}/feed.md

### Content Negotiation
This site supports the `Accept: text/markdown` header via alternate link tags.
Look for `<link rel="alternate" type="text/markdown">` in the HTML head.

## Site Structure

- Homepage: {{ site.url }}/
- Blog Archive: {{ site.url }}/archive/
- RSS Feed: {{ site.url }}/feed/

## Recent Posts

{% for post in site.posts limit:20 %}
- [{{ post.title }}]({{ site.url }}{{ post.url }}) - {{ post.date | date: "%Y-%m-%d" }}
  Markdown: {{ site.url }}{{ post.url | split: '/' | compact | join: '/' }}.md
{% endfor %}

## About

This is the personal website of Josh Ferrara. Posts span from 2006 to present.

## Contact

Website: {{ site.url }}
